languages.text: "В нас живет душа истинных эльдар. Наших предков, о которых трусы с кораблей-миров предпочли забыть..."

traits.locale_text: "В нас живет душа истинных эльдар. Наших предков, о которых трусы с кораблей-миров предпочли забыть..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ours are the souls of the true Aeldari. Our ancestors, whom the craftworld cowards preferred to forget..."
languages.original_text: "В нас живет душа истинных эльдар. Наших предков, о которых трусы с кораблей-миров предпочли забыть..."

traits.locale_text: "Ours are the souls of the true Aeldari. Our ancestors, whom the craftworld cowards preferred to forget..."

languages.text: “因为我们才是艾达灵族真正的后代，而那些居住在方舟世界的懦夫，却打算忘记我们的祖先……”
languages.original_text: "Ours are the souls of the true Aeldari. Our ancestors, whom the craftworld cowards preferred to forget..."

traits.locale_text: “因为我们才是艾达灵族真正的后代，而那些居住在方舟世界的懦夫，却打算忘记我们的祖先……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺たちの魂は真のアエルダリのもの。方舟の臆病者たちは、俺らの父祖を忘れ去りたがっていた…」
languages.original_text: "Ours are the souls of the true Aeldari. Our ancestors, whom the craftworld cowards preferred to forget..."

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちの魂は真のアエルダリのもの。方舟の臆病者たちは、俺らの父祖を忘れ去りたがっていた…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Nuestras almas son las de los verdaderos Aeldari. Nuestros antepasados, a quienes los cobardes de los mundos astronave eligieron olvidar...».
languages.original_text: "Ours are the souls of the true Aeldari. Our ancestors, whom the craftworld cowards preferred to forget..."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestras almas son las de los verdaderos Aeldari. Nuestros antepasados, a quienes los cobardes de los mundos astronave eligieron olvidar...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Unsere Seelen sind die der wahren Aeldari. Unsere Ahnen, deren Weltenschiffe Feiglinge lieber vergessen wollten ..."
languages.original_text: "Ours are the souls of the true Aeldari. Our ancestors, whom the craftworld cowards preferred to forget..."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Seelen sind die der wahren Aeldari. Unsere Ahnen, deren Weltenschiffe Feiglinge lieber vergessen wollten ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Nos âmes sont celles des véritables Aeldaris. Nos ancêtres, que les lâches des vaisseaux-mondes ont préféré oublier... »
languages.original_text: "Ours are the souls of the true Aeldari. Our ancestors, whom the craftworld cowards preferred to forget..."

traits.locale_text: « Nos âmes sont celles des véritables Aeldaris. Nos ancêtres, que les lâches des vaisseaux-mondes ont préféré oublier... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Bizim ruhumuz hakiki Aeldari ruhu. Gemidünya korkaklarının yüz çevirdiği atalarımız..."
languages.original_text: "Ours are the souls of the true Aeldari. Our ancestors, whom the craftworld cowards preferred to forget..."

traits.locale_text: "Bizim ruhumuz hakiki Aeldari ruhu. Gemidünya korkaklarının yüz çevirdiği atalarımız..."
